entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 40
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW AFTER MIDNIGHT
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 40 PERCENT

SNOW LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING, THEN RAIN AND SNOW IN THE AFTERNOON
LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 90 PERCENT

CLOUDY
RAIN IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF RAIN AND SNOW AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEW LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW IN THE EVENING
LOWS AROUND 20
CHANCE OF SNOW 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
LOWS AROUND 20

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
